general.gigTitle: develop website in odoo and fix odoo errors

sellerCard.description:
Odoo ERP Expert | Functional Consultant & Developer
With over 6+ years of expertise, I provide end-to-end Odoo solutions tailored to your business needs. From accounting, sales, and CRM to inventory, helpdesk, and project management and all other odoo modules, I specialize in customizations, feature development, and training. I ensure seamless workflows that optimize your operations and drive success. Let's unlock the full potential of Odoo for your business today!

description.content:
Hi! Ali Hunain here. I've 3 + years of experience working on various projects as an Odoo developer.

I will make a clean and responsive odoo site and theme, like e-commerce store, a few commerce entry like a bakery store, office, fabricating and numerous more. For custom necessity of odoo site and topic it would be ideal if you contact me, we'll examine and provide you time and fetched agreeing to that.

NOTE: The cost may vary depending on your requirements. *


***Please Do Not Place Order Without Discussion***

  • Develop and customize Odoo enterprise modules (v10 to v15)
  • Odoo technical support
  • Odoo API integrations
  • Bug fixings
  • Odoo Module customization


Odoo services:

- Installation and Hosting of Odoo.

- Odoo Implementation & Customization

- Module Migration.

- Import/Export Data.

- Odoo Training (Funtional & Technical)

- Odoo Consultancy

- Odoo Hosting

Please get in touch with me if you have any questions or concerns.

reviews.comment: Ali truly exceeded expectations yet again! His work was FLAWLESS—well-documented, bug-free, and executed with top-notch professionalism. Always quick, proactive, and going above and beyond, it’s no wonder he’s your #1 Techguy! 👏

consultationData.description: I'm offering expert consultation on Odoo ERP, guiding you on how to leverage Odoo to meet your business needs. We'll explore its capabilities, limitations, and why it's a powerful ERP solution today.
